headline.print_headline: Nicotine Addiction Is Quick In Youths, Research Finds
headline.main: Nicotine Addiction Is Quick in Youths, Research Finds

docs.lead_paragraph: A young cigarette smoker can begin to feel powerful desires for nicotine within two days of first inhaling, new research suggests.
docs.snippet: A young cigarette smoker can begin to feel powerful desires for nicotine within two days of first inhaling, new research suggests.
